snippet: With China pressing territorial claims and the United States fortifying its alliances in the region, a day of military talks will precede wider-ranging discussions this week.
abstract: Limited military talks between China and the United States begin as a prelude to a wider-ranging economic and strategic dialogue between the two countries; talks are likely to focus on Chinese suspicion concerning stepped-up spying by United States planes and ships, and American concerns about China's growing array of weaponry.
lead_paragraph: With China pressing territorial claims and the United States fortifying its alliances in the region, a day of military talks will precede wider-ranging discussions this week.

headline.seo: Unease Mounting, China and U.S. to Open Military Talks
headline.main: Unease Mounting, China and U.S. to Open Military Talks
headline.print_headline: U.S.-China Military Talks to Open Amid Unease
